name: London Lemonade
preparation:
Once the mercury starts rising, it’s officially time to wheel out the lemonade. Since summer cocktails should be simple to stir together in the heat of the moment, there’s no better duo than Bulldog Gin and tart lemonade over ice. This simple tipple is a must when the temperature starts to rise.

Add the gin and lemonade to a double Old Fashioned glass filled with ice.

Stir, and garnish with a lemon wheel.
